translation.2512361458: Have an Aircraft Carrier / Light Carrier and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.2523335736: Continue Carrying Out the Rat Transportation  towards South!
translation.1014920:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki.
I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
translation.2770690233: Have a Submarine Tender as flagship and 4+ Submarines in your main fleet.
translation.2725015877:
Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class. Please remember.
Don't forget about me... ok?
translation.1578310828: Organize the Main Fleet with a Battleship and Heavy Cruisers!
translation.2062627073: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 for a total of 7 times within the same week.
translation.1529735316: Sortie a Light/Standard Carrier flagship and 5 Light Cruisers, Destroyers or Seaplane Tenders.
translation.1286053887:
Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki!
Thanks for having me!
translation.1842125054: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 4 Ships to World 3-1 and defeat the boss.
translation.88088106: I'm Naganami, the fourth ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers. And off we go. Yeah!
translation.191059606: Organize All 3 Sisters of the Sendai-class Light Cruisers!
translation.641225628: Craft a piece of Equipment. (Failure is OK)
translation.4084027023: Special carpentry fairies for building certain Furniture items.
translation.408926878:
Arare...
I won't say 'ncha-'... Look after me...
translation.438464968:
Michishio here.
Why did I get assigned to such a fleet?
translation.3401050439: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 TB(Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan.
translation.4081000153: Have 2 Light Cruisers in your fleet.
translation.1825681793: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui and 2 Ships to World 3-1 and defeat the boss.
translation.126221847: Have ONLY Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.
translation.3627624050:
I am Battleship Nagato, pleased to meet you.
Leave the enemy battleships to me.
translation.2536074425: Have Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your second fleet.
translation.3005185623:
Super-dreadnought Fusou-class, the elder Fusou here.
Please take care of me along with my sister Yamashiro.
translation.124298339: Sortie to World 1-2 and clear the stage.
translation.884243221: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.3246871142:
I'm Furutaka.
I'll be happy to show how all the good points of heavy cruisers.
translation.403966902: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi and Mochizuki in your main fleet.
translation.3789109318: Organize a Carrier Task Force in Your Second Fleet!
translation.790313895: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and 1 Fast Ship in your main fleet.
translation.3637300377: Strive to Increase the Level of the Fleet's Training!
translation.4002897884: Sortie to World 1-2 AGAIN and clear the stage.
translation.3156659497: Sortie Takao, Atago, Maya, Choukai and 2 Ships to World 2-2 and defeat the boss.
translation.897358290: Sortie 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DDs to World 2-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.816584958:
Light cruiser Nagara!
Please take good care of me!
translation.3167368147:
I'm Shoukaku, the first of the Shoukaku-class carriers.
I will try my best with Zuikaku to try and live up to the names of my seniors
in the first and second aviation divisions.
translation.2926718527:
I'm Amagi, an Unryuu-class Carrier.
Thanks for your recruitment, Admiral.
Amagi will concentrate!
translation.2099809251: Sink 3 enemy Aircraft Carriers. (Light Carriers are fine too)
translation.2581050599:
Submarine U-511 of the German Navy,
please call me Yuu.
I've come a long way, so I'll be in your care...
translation.3307359230:
I'm the light cruiser Kitakami.
Nice ta meet 'ya.
translation.753628775:
Ye~s, It's Miss Kinugasa's debut!
Together with Aoba, take good care of me!
translation.2740408425: Sortie Fusou, Mutsu, Nagato, Yamashiro and 2 Ships to 4-2, 2 S-Rank victories at the boss.
translation.931933936:
Yes... I am Taihou.
Thank you for your reception, Admiral...
I shall bring victory to you and your fleet!
translation.402306802: Defeat the flagship of an enemy fleet.
translation.3506120646: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day.
translation.1293363678: "Carrier Task Force", advance to the Northern Sea!
translation.3489125414:
Admiral, thank you for your hard work.
Seaplane Tender Mizuho has now arrived.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
translation.1799111315: Organize All 4 Sisters of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers!
translation.2397037377: Sortie Aoba, Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.987200806:
I've... come again, to these seas.
Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayashimo... reporting for duty.
translation.1812233126: Organize a Fleet of 2 Light Cruisers!
translation.905466377:
I'm Isuzu. Leave the torpedo squadrons to me.
I'll bring victory to the Admiral with all my power. Pleased to meet you!
translation.3127250017: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and 2 Ships to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.704765504: Have Kongou(Kai-2), Hiei(Kai-2), Haruna(Kai-2) and Kirishima(Kai-2) in your main fleet.
translation.3139229898:
Special-type destroyer, Akebono.
Hey! Don't look at me, you shitty Admiral!
translation.2573325224:
I'm the British-born returnee, Kongou!
Nice to meet you!
translation.4225092515:
Cheers! I'm Suzukaze!
W If I join the fleet it will be equivalent to 100 ships!
translation.1380257152: Sortie ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to any map.
translation.1650528021:
Aircraft carrier, Houshou.
Though I'm inexperienced, I look forward to your guidance.
translation.4095183426:
Fourth ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Yura.
Pleased to make your acquaintance!
translation.4275916115: Sortie to World 1-5 and obtain four A-Ranks or better at the boss.
translation.2353831805: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and 1 Fast Ship to any map.
translation.3479230116:
I'm the fourth battleship of the Vittorio Veneto-class, Roma. Nice to meet you.
What? Please don't stare at me, okay?
translation.4156319117:
I'm Akitsu Maru, sir.
It is an honour to be part of this fleet, sir.
translation.3371955053:
I-168 here. What? It's hard to say?
Okay, just call me Imuya. Nice to meet you!
translation.2663062072: Okay~, thanks for waiting! The experimental armament cruiser Yuubari has arrived!
translation.182242884: Seize Control of the Southwestern Archipelago Sea!
translation.788919628:
I'm Ikazuchi! Not "Kaminari"!
Please take care of that part too, okay!
translation.2692203334:
Second of the Nagato-class Battleship, Mutsu here. Pleased to meet you.
Don't play with fire too much, okay? Please...
translation.1290891883: Sortie 3 Slow BB/BBVs, 1 CL and 2 Ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.2370717073:
I am Teruzuki, the second ship of Akizuki-class anti-air sestroyer!
As with Akizuki-neesan, it is a great honor to be in your care!
translation.3077038448: 15m Duplex Rangefinder + Type 21 Air Radar Kai 2
translation.3820145921:
Ayanami-class destroyer Sazanami, Master.
You write it like this, but read it as "Sazanami".
translation.332591074:
Seaplane tender Chiyoda.
My older sister Chitose isn't bothering you, is she?
translation.2041513802:
I'm Haguro, the youngest of the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters.
U-Um... I'm sorry!
translation.1221805359:
Light cruiser, Tama.
I'm not a cat, meow.
translation.1517237755:
12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze.
Don't worry, I will protect you.
translation.2006162402:
So you're the commander, huh.
Well, you better try your hardest.
translation.2446853327:
Hibiki here.
I'm often referred to as "The Phoenix" due to my exploits.
translation.1580877785: Allows you to reinforce a ship to permanently add an additional consumable equipment slot.
translation.1660227753:
I'm Suzuya! What a lively fleet this is!
I'll be in your care!
translation.2458187096: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE Again!
translation.1936965615: Preparation for Large Ship Construction! (Part I)
translation.598523563: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, 1 Light Cruiser and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.1757902093:
I'm Hatsukaze, nice to meet you.
Admiral, how many did you have before me, I wonder?
translation.3075899122: Sortie Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro and 3 Ships to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.194263487: Sortie 36 times, meet 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses, and get 6 S ranks.
translation.2868330708:
The eighth ship of Kagerou-class Destroyer, I'm Yukikaze.
I'll be in your care!
translation.4131213102: Organize a Light Surface Counterattack Fleet!
translation.1753503445: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi and Shiranui in your main fleet.
translation.1971651110:
Sendai has arrived.
Please leave the night battle to me.
translation.4031513405:
Yes ye~s! I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Murasame.
Everyone, nice to meet you!
translation.2878036938: I'm Kiso. I'll bestow upon you the absolute best victory.
translation.674784207: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, Murakumo and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.2076179807:
I'm Akatsuki!
Treat me like the fully-fledged lady I am!
translation.3071347309: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna and Kirishima in your main fleet.
translation.2120577768:
Hi, I'm Yuudachi, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer.
Nice to meet you!
translation.4248442416:
Hmpf, it seems that I've kept you waiting...
SSecond of the Yamato-class battleship, Musashi, has arrived!
translation.3227047021: Organize the Nagumo Carrier Task Force!
translation.2336199001:
First ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Shiratsuyu.
Yes, the first ship!
translation.653469309:
Hi, thanks for your time! I'm Aoba!
Could you spare a few words?
translation.2424531538: The 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu!
translation.3023627783: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio and 1 Ship to 5-1 and, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.2299681592: Sortie to World 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times.
translation.2727476470: Special drop available only during a certain time of the year.
translation.3075266700:
I'm the destroyer Asashio.
I'm always ready for a battle.
translation.3630391813:
Destroyer, Hamakaze.
Henceforth I shall be attached to your fleet.
translation.4102484666: Strive to Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route!
translation.1640810678: Have an Aircraft Carrier / Light Carrier and 3 Destroyers in your second fleet.
translation.1270697153: Sortie to World 1-5 and get at A-rank or higher at the boss node 3 times.
translation.1261836169: Sortie a Light Cruiser as flagship and 3 Destroyers.
translation.827912953: Perform 3 successful Expeditions within the same day.
translation.2179053505: Sortie 2 CV/CVLs, 2 DDs and 2 Ships to World 4-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1405583295:
Buongiorno!
I'm Libeccio, a Maestrale-class destroyer!
Just Libe is fine. Nice to meet you Admiral!
translation.496174362: Sortie Arashio, Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.1360457467: Strengthen the Fleet by Constructing Shipgirls!
translation.1046276014:
Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes.
Leave the transport missions to me... desu.
translation.1812180731: Rush the Battleship Force to the Northern Sea!
translation.1590299360:
Is a nice breeze coming?
It's time for me, the next generation
destroyer prototype, Amatsukaze, to debut.
translation.3263198955:
Yayoi, reporting for duty...
Pleased to meet you. Please don't be too concerned about me...
translation.563031676:
My name is Kisaragi.
Please keep me at your side.
translation.1335657380: Sortie Souryuu(Kai-2) as flagship, Hiryuu(Kai-2), 2 DDs and 2 Ship to 4-3, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.956812105:
My name is Samidare! I look forward to working with you.
Please leave any escort missions to me!
translation.1163453536: Sortie a fleet with a Battleship as flagship. (BBV don't count)
translation.858382434: Sortie Unryuu(Kai) and 5 Ships to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.

translation.3796034287: Have ONLY Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo in your main fleet.
translation.1482257910:
I am Umikaze, the Seventh of the Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer,
and the First of the Revised Shiratsuyu-class.
I'll be in your care, Admiral!

translation.1250142406: Sink 20 enemy Aircraft Carriers. (Light Carriers are fine too)

translation.255466983: Equipment used to prevent a ship sinking.

translation.3360724164: Have ONLY Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your main fleet.

translation.1347076592:
The Ninth Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer,
Kawakaze of the revised Shiratsuyu-class. Nice to meet you!
Ah, about the reading of my name, do not get it wrong!
translation.435929892:
We've finally met! I'm Kagerou.
Treat me well!
translation.3122735363: Have 3 any of the Nagato/Ise/Fusou/Yamato-class and 1 Light Cruiser in your main fleet.
translation.3918516442: Get 5 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.1993750592: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE!
translation.4092536298: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
translation.2270487850:
Light aircraft carrier, Ryuujou here! Ain't my silhouette distinctive?
But, launching carrier planes one-after-another makes me a proper carrier, ya know!　You can count on me!
translation.4237925745: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo to World 1-5, C-Rank or better at the boss.
translation.3864967812: Have ONLY Hatsuharu, Hatsushimo, Nenohi and Wakaba in your main fleet
translation.289817296:
Hello, it's Nenohi!
I hope my name wasn't too hard to read, yes?
translation.3899923341: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu in your main fleet.
translation.2243733727:
Nice to meet you.
I'm Ayanami, a special class destroyer.
translation.2253033470: Have 2 Heavy Cruiser in your fleet.(no CAV)
translation.2536631567: Carry Out the Deep Sea Submarine Operations!
translation.3389689358: Intensify the Concentration in Developing Equipment!
translation.159942606:
Kagerou-class destroyer tenth ship.
Tokitsukaze... has arrived!
translation.3282937898: Have Choukai(K2) as FS, any of Furutaka/Kako/Aoba/Kinugasa/Yuubari/Tenryuu in your main fleet.
translation.1578307218:
Admiral, I'm Tanikaze!
I'll be in your care from now on!
translation.3970477202: We are Hatsuharu. We thank you in advance.
translation.1850826261: Sortie 2 Aviation Battleships and 4 Ships to World 4-4 and defeat the boss.
translation.1886087435:
I'm destroyer Shimakaze. When it comes to speed
I'm the best there is, swift like the island breeze!
translation.605421769: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara and Haguro in your main fleet.
translation.89086556: Have a Battleship and 2 Heavy Cruisers in your main fleet.
translation.2249351741:
Yay~! I arrived-pyon! My name is Uzuki!,
you can call me U-chan!
translation.2658148830:
Hello! Last of the Yuugumo-class, it's Kiyoshimo!
I'm a bit late, but I'll be in your care!
translation.1230165658: Replenishes fuel and ammo of fleet when low. (Consumable)
translation.1774409677:
Hello. I'm light cruiser Ooi.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
translation.1082644709:
I'm aircraft carrier Kaga.
Are you my Admiral?... I have fairly high expectations of you.
translation.3005613589: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet to the Solomon Waters!
translation.1500057369: Have Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki and 1 Destroyer in your main fleet
translation.3997556606:
Third ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyer, Kazagumo.
So you're the admiral. Roger.
Well then, your orders!
translation.2229928435: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Sea!
translation.1975372555:
Super-dreadnought, First of the Ise-class, Ise.
Setting off!
translation.656226470:
Is the microphone's volume good? Check, 1,2...
Okay. How do you do, I'm Kirishima.
translation.3971243756:
I am Tone!
With my addition to the fleet, there'll be no problems in scouting out the enemy!
translation.3967500265:
I'm aircraft carrier Hiryuu.
Leave the carrier battles to me, I can fight on against any and all adversity.
translation.2669558709:
First ship of the Yuugumo-class, Yuugumo, has arrived.
Admiral, it's okay to spoil me a bit.
translation.95891596:
I'm Mogami.
It's alright, I won't collide with anyone this time. Really!
translation.3283187195: Used to unlock additional repair docks or construction dry docks.

translation.565455277: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base!
translation.3300759035: Have Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your main fleet.
translation.2432256847: Get 7 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.1993263324:
Nice to meet you... Maruyu, reporting for duty.
Huh? You haven’t heard about me? How could that be...

translation.2870149458: Morale boosting desserts to boost ships to 'sparkling' status.

Shiranui here.
I look forward to your guidance and encouragement.
translation.1066368251:
Greetings, I'm Mikuma.
I wonder where Mogami could be hiding?

translation.2219803482: Continue to Obtain Technology through Submarine Dispatch Operations!

translation.610068348: I'm Kikuzuki, let's move out together.

translation.1155347567: Proceed with Modernization, and Prepare for War!
translation.3440780293:
I'm Shigure of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers.
Nice to meet you.
translation.3808053717: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy's Northern Fleet!
translation.1474704113: Morale boosting desserts to remove fatigue.
translation.1058299527:
U-Um... my name is Isonami.
Pleased to meet you.
translation.2798558792: Sortie Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and Tenryuu to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.2798693094: Sortie Abukuma(K2) as FS, Hibiki(K2), Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to 3-2, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1335444779:
Good day, Admiral. I'm I-401, the second ship in my special submarine series.
Just call me Shioi!
translation.187096248:
Guten Tag.
I am the Destroyer Max Schultz
But, Max is fine. Pleased to meet you.
translation.2174457417:
First of the Yamato-class battleship, Yamato.
Heading forth!
translation.3251857731: Get 20 victories in Exercises within the same week.
translation.506897920:
Guten Morgen!
I'm the heavy cruiser Prinz Eugen. Nice to meet you!
translation.4146591572: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.
translation.806297467: Do equipment modernization 1 time. (Failure is OK)
translation.4182008750: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.1455626330:
Guten Tag.
I am Bismarck, the nameship of the Bismarck-class battleships.
You should remember it well.
translation.1223073509: Complete Expedition 30 for the first time.
translation.1866810879: Have Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa and Aoba in your main fleet.
translation.3385985428: Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands!
translation.1208353880: Have flagship equipped with Zero F M52C(601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu.
translation.1183565045:
Hello~! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze here!

translation.1677291778: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami and Shigure in your main fleet.
translation.1814960664: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
translation.2142823284:
I am Myoukou, of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers.
Let us work on this together.
translation.1304906159: Organize both Sisters of the Tenryuu-class Light Cruisers!

I'm the destroyer Ooshio.
BA small body with a large torpedoes! Leave it to me.
translation.631277027:
I'm aircraft carrier Akagi.
If you're forming a carrier division, just leave it to me.
translation.2462785483: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage.
translation.3427324906: Buckets to restore ship HP to full instantly in the Docks.
translation.3145007425: Have Souryuu(Kai-2) as flagship with Hiryuu(Kai-2) and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.1749890828:
Nagatsuki here.
Don't make light of us destroyers. We're useful.
translation.1708208076: Craft 3 pieces of Equipment. (Failures are OK)
translation.3295516659:
Second of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Kako here.
Let's get along!
translation.3795635100:
The fleet's idol, Naka-chan here!
Nice to meet you!
translation.844709855: Sortie to the Sea around Nansei Islands!
translation.1469135307: Complete the Transport Operations towards South!
translation.1928678591: Allows you to accept additional quest based on how many Headquarter Personnel you have.
translation.1106150994: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta and 2 Ships in your main fleet.
translation.681575674:
I'm aircraft carrier Hiryuu.
Leave the carrier battles to me, I can fight on against any and all adversity.
translation.2443505616:
Second of the Agano-class light cruiser, Noshiro, has arrived.
Glad to meet you!
translation.3566387895:
Admiral, Light Cruiser Ooyodo has joined the battle lines.
Please leave the fleet administration and supervision to me.
translation.751740480:
You are my commander?
I am Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
translation.956292269: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss 3 times.
translation.3374202276: Have a Seaplane Tender in your fleet.
translation.1906956294:
Guten Tag... Ah, my mistake... sorry.
Please, call me Hachi.
translation.2753706370:
Good morning~. Asashio-class destroyer number six, Yamagumo～
Please treat me well~!

translation.580399665:
Kagerou-class Destroyer, Nowaki, reporting in.
Well, Commander. Let us proceed.

translation.3086428089: Sortie 2 Battleships, 1 Light Carrier and 3 Ships to World 3-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.729352360: H-Hello, I'm Abukuma, a light cruiser.
translation.2972827399:
Second of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, the younger sister Zuikaku.
The lucky carrier, you say? That's not it, I just fight with all my might.. As long as I have planes, I won't lose!
translation.3627052048: Month-long Strengthening of the Marine Escort!
translation.3443744629: Have Myoukou, Nachi and Haguro in your main fleet.
translation.1836411980:
My name is Shikinami.
I'll be in your care.
translation.1641836126: Blueprints used for some ship's Second Remodel. Costs 4 Medals.
translation.4116478799:
Hi, I'm Ashigara. My specialty is surface combat.
Nice to meet you.
translation.2526789873: Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
translation.2744090423:
Good morning!　I'm Hayasui,
an oiler equipped with seaplanes!
I'll do my best to support everyone!
translation.762651343: Have Abukuma as FS, Hibiki(K2), Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your main fleet.
translation.3849339975:
I'm the sixth of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Takanami.
E-ehm, I will do my best! Really, probably!
translation.3994326747: Have Akatsuki(Kai-2) as flagship, Hibiki(Kai-2), Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your main fleet.
translation.899706573: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and Michishio in your main fleet.
translation.81507296:
I'm Kasumi.
What are we waiting for? Come on!
translation.2980754680: Sortie 2 Aviation Cruisers, 2 Aviation Battleships and 2 Ships to World 4-2 and defeat the boss.
translation.1508470743: Sortie a Level 90 - 99 Flagship to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3492468291: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.2423637906: Have a Level 100 Ship as your flagship and 5 Ships in your main fleet.
translation.272486148:
Good day to you.
I am the heavy cruiser Kumano.
translation.2787734205: Organize the Main Battleship Force: "The 2nd Squadron"!
translation.3902164545: Preparation for Large Ship Construction! (Part II)
translation.3957818941: Sortie to World 1-5 and obtain an A-Rank or higher at the boss 10 times.
translation.1347539765:
Good day, I'm Submarine Tender Taigei.
I may be inexperienced, but I am glad to be of service.
translation.1609858032: Rewarded to players who have cleared the final map of the event on Hard Difficulty.
translation.3734832039: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for Another Rush to the Northern Sea!
translation.1180188217:
I'm called Natori......
I'll do my best not to cause you any trouble!
translation.1450577699: Sortie Nachi as FS, Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono and 1 Ship to 2-2, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1655255805: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base!
translation.3851769922: Sortie Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 Destroyer and 2 Ships to World 1-4, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.2523202175:
The second ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class battleships, Littorio.
I have confidence in my speed and firepower. Nice to meet ya~
translation.687753534:
Hello! I-58 here!
You can call me Goya. I'm not bitter!
translation.3794751683:
Fast battleship Haruna, reporting for duty.
You're the admiral, correct? Please take good care of me.
translation.2068527367: I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember it, okay?
translation.493155115: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki in your main fleet.
translation.3886780720: Have Light Cruiser as flagship and 3 Destroyers.
translation.2263001951: Have Takao, Atago, Choukai and Maya in your main fleet.
translation.552806214: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser!
translation.295108834: Sortie Maya (Kai/Kai-2), 1 Light Cruiser and 2 Destroyers to World 2-3, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3815990069: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Mochizuki, Yayoi and 2 DDs to 3-2 and obtain a C-Rank at the boss.
translation.4118310601:
Akigumo, reporting for duty!
Look after me, Admiral!
translation.2640529281: Sink an enemy Aircraft Carrier/Light Carrier.
translation.3117953171:
I'm the Ayanami-class destroyer Oboro.
I won't lose to anyone... probably...
translation.2762096404: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.1242789428:
I'm Katsuragi, the third ship of the Unryuu-Class carriers!
Eh?'A floating anti-air gun platform'?
I-It's not like that...! What are you saying!
translation.3315820027: Item consumed when Constructing new ships or Developing new equipment.
translation.1327713033: Perform 10 successful Expeditions within the same day.
translation.278422414: a special piece of aviation equipment for a very large aircraft carrier, and will be needed for the Second Remodel of that type of carrier.
translation.4237956: Have Sendai, Jintsuu, and Naka in your main fleet.
translation.184643100: Organize a Fast Battleship Force with the Kongou-class!
translation.3277557421:
Light aircraft carrier Shouhou, at your service.
I realize that I'm a little small, but please make a place for me in your fleet!
translation.2209280448: Blowtorches to instantly complete a ship construction in the dry dock.
translation.579089260: Have Akashi as flagship in your main fleet.
translation.1757921482: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your main fleet.
translation.4162891560: Perform 30 successful Expeditions within the same week.
translation.1465796473: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu and Souryuu in your main fleet.
translation.4286795215:
Good morning. I am Takao.
It's great that you look like an excellent Admiral.
translation.2270106801:
Chitose here. I'm the first Japanese seaplane tender.
Nice to meet you!
translation.1473050178: Have Unryuu as flagship in your main fleet.
translation.1020289469: A Thorough 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu!
translation.2452387460: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your main fleet.
translation.2272484332:
Hello~!
I'm the latest light cruiser Agano~. Teehee~.
translation.330514506:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, has arrived.
Admiral, it's nice to meet you.
translation.3461316404: It's me, Urakaze, nice to meet 'ya!
translation.111051845: Marriage Ring and Papers for the provisional Marriage.
translation.1733553329:
Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, reporting in!
So you're the Commander... huh. Hmm. Well, it's fine. I'll do it!
translation.4243080814:
I'm the special-type, Ayanami-class destroyer Ushio.
It would be nice to be dismissed soon...
translation.980156100: Operation Contact Foreign Ship through Submarine Dispatch!
translation.1748099343: Get 3 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.1130240328:
Ex-merchant ship aircraft carrier, Junyou here~!
Woohoo~
translation.2073501474: Organize Both Sisters of the Fusou-class Battleships!
translation.1876933738: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 DB(Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei.
translation.2642850710:
You're the commander, right? I'm Mikazuki.
I hope you welcome me warmly into your fleet.
translation.1749244876: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week.
translation.2349585631: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for a Rush to the Northern Sea!
translation.3226438351: The Torpedo Squadron Bashi Island Emergency Deployment!
translation.2454744987:
The fourth ship in the Hatsuharu-class, Hatsushimo.
Everybody, I'm very pleased to meet you!
translation.1275389550: Get 2 victories in Exercises to express your love.
translation.3286328934:
I'm Zuihou.
I'm a light carrier, but with proper experience, I'll be able to perform as good as an aircraft carrier, just you see!
translation.2627531043:
Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I?
My name is Arashio.
translation.744926109: Can be exchanged for Blueprint or a pittance of materials.
translation.3978674679:
Pleased to meet you.
Second of the Tone-class heavy cruisers, Chikuma here.
translation.3577611791: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki(Kai-2), Ikazuchi and Inazuma to World 1-5, C-Rank or better at the boss.
translation.3883567308: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet!
translation.2651981149: Continue Exercising, and Strive to Increase the Level of Fleet's Training!
translation.2658791249:
I'm Hiei, Kongou's younger sister.
I look forward to gaining experience and getting closer to my sister's brilliance.
translation.893406: Sortie Choukai(K2) as FS, Furutaka/Kako/Aoba/Kinugasa/Yuubari/Tenryuu to 5-1, S-Rank Boss.
translation.2866966859: Sortie Akatsuki(K2), Hibiki(K2), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to 1-5, A-Rank or better at the Boss.
translation.436206296: Sortie a CL as FS, 3-5 DDs and 2 CLs to World 1-4 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.76346961: I'm... Hatsuyuki... Nice to meet you.
translation.4048178580: Have Abukuma(K2) as FS, Hibiki(K2), Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet.
translation.2350780368: Have 2 Ships in your main fleet.
translation.1605665944:
Nice to meet you, I'm Tatsuta~.
I hope Tenryuu-chan hasn't been causing you trouble~?
translation.3426280930:
I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima!
Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
translation.3016720630: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy Fleet!
translation.2522890410:
My name is Tenryuu.
Fufufu, ya scared?
translation.2140249275:
Light Cruiser Yahagi, reporting for duty.
Let's do our best to the end, Admiral!
translation.3557671588: Sortie a DD as FS, 1 CA, 1 CL and 3 DDs to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.958167057: Gather All of the Elite 3rd Battleship Division!
translation.3226943684:
My name is Izumo Ma... no, Hiyou.
I'm an aircraft carrier. Pleased to meet you, Admiral!
translation.3503715143:
The younger of the Fusou-class battleship sisters, Yamashiro here.
Umm, have you seen my sister Fusou?
translation.3601354047: Equipment used to prevent a ship sinking and fully restores HP.
translation.1971424992: Carry Out the Decoy Task Force Support Operation!
translation.2177834804:
You're the Admiral? I see. Anyway...
Second of the Ise-class Battleship, Hyuuga. Remember me, if you would.
translation.2586634115: Sortie 1-2 CLs as flagship and 4-5 DDs to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3268026147:
Um... I'm light cruiser Jintsuu...
Pleased to meet you...
translation.1718499952:
I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser.
Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.
translation.4029921196: Sortie Abukuma as FS, Hibiki(K2), Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to 3-2, beat the boss.
translation.1806299611: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama and Kiso in your main fleet.
translation.509390416: Scrap Equipment 2 times to express your love.
translation.2202464629: Have Hiryuu(Kai-2) as flagship, Souryuu and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.3241451769:
Such a great admiral makes me happy.
I'm I-19. Yep, calling me 'Iku' is fine!
translation.671668934:
Pyan♪ The fourth Agano-class light cruiser, Sakawa!
Commander, nice to meet you!
translation.1897430755:
Guten Morgen.
I'm Leberecht Maass.
Lebe is fine, yep.
translation.3782665762: Send in the Surface Counterattack Fleet!
translation.1509509027:
Yuugumo-class destroyer, Makigumo here.
I'll follow my sister Yuugumo's example and do my best!
translation.819467713: Special drops available only during a certain time of the year.
